Package asap.realizer.scheduler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SchedulingHandler
    Schedules BehaviourBlock bb (e.g.
    SchedulingStrategy
    Interface for strategies to schedule BML blocks (that is: resolve the time constraints and add the behaviors to the appropiate plans).
    UniModalResolver
    Resolves the timing of a TimedPlanUnit, given certain time constraints upon it.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BMLASchedulingHandler
    Creates BMLT blocks and handles the first part of the BMLT state machine
    BMLBBlock
    Manages the state of a BML block used in ASAP.
    BMLBlockManager
    Manages the state of BML blocks on the basis of behavior feedback, warnings and exceptions.
    BMLScheduler
    BMLScheduler, handles BML block states, feedback listeners and maintains engines and anticipators.
    LinearStretchResolver
    Resolves the timing of a TimedPlanUnit, by satisfying the constraints using uniform stretching
    SimpleAfterConstraintSolver
    Fast solver that can satifisfy after constraints in most BML scripts.
    SmartBodySchedulingStrategy
    Strategy implementing the SmartBody scheduling algorithm:
    The behaviors are processed in BML order.
    SortedSmartBodySchedulingStrategy
    Improved SmartBodySchedulingStrategy, sorts the behaviors (e.g.
    TimePegAndConstraint
    Links a constraint to a timepeg and a behavior sync point id
